# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This e-book on bio-mathematics was created through a collaborative effort by academics and students at the [University of Toronto Mississauga](https://www.utm.utoronto.ca/), [Florida State University](https://www.fsu.edu/) and a gifted scholar at the [Maclay School](https://www.maclay.org/).
